translations: n.宗教，宗教信仰（religion 的复数）

phrs.translation: 有组织的宗教；组织宗教
宗教哲学；宗教哲学文化

sentences.sentence: Most religions teach you to be truthful.
sentences.translation: 大多数宗教都教你要诚实。

sentences.sentence: Most religions posit the existence of life after death.
sentences.translation: 大多数宗教都假定人死后生命仍存在。

sentences.sentence: He has a very tolerant attitude towards other religions.
sentences.translation: 他对其他宗教持非常包容的态度。
